outline:
Canaanite = see Cana "zealous"
  1. descendant of inhabitant of Canaan
  2. descendant or inhabitant of Canaan
  3. a merchant, trader
strongs_def: a Kenaanite or inhabitant of Kenaan; by implication, a pedlar (the Canaanites standing for their neighbors the Ishmaelites, who conducted mercantile caravans)
